title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Addressing COVID-19 Vaccine Misinformation and Reducing Vaccine Hesitancy

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners distinguish misinformation from scientific information about COVID-19 vaccines with 80%+ accuracy.
Learners achieve a 20%+ reduction in pre-post scores on the Adult Vaccine Hesitancy Scale (AVHS) assessment.
Learners create 2-minute video content explaining scientific evidence for vaccines to peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
